divs: sighting detailsi was home from college for x-mas break. my mom, her friend, & my sister were sitting in the den area, which looks out onto a small cove of lake norman. it was almost dark and we noticed a bright light shining into the den as we were talking, like a strong beam of light. we looked out the half closed blinds & saw a large, oval spaceship type of object that had a series of lights on the exterior, some of them were colored i think. we all went outside in the yard. it was hovering over the mariner villas condominiums right across the cove. it was crystal clear from the moment we saw it that it was not of this earth. this "spaceship" was close enough, & low enough that we could see a lot of detail. it was enormous. it appeared to be glowing from the inside, & had a misty appearance; it didn't look really heavy but was solid. i was extremely excited as i have had a huge fear of ufo's since childhood. i basically ran around like a chicken w\ its head cut off. i did not know what to do. i called the local news network to see if there had been any reportings of a ufo on lake norman. they said no, which was surprising b\c they were so close to residences. i told them i was looking at something unexplainable, but they didn't really seem interested. it moved very slowly & from a distance there appeared in succession two or three more of these spaceships. my mom's friend was in awe & seemed to want to communicate with them. my sister was frightened & my mom was pretty calm. after about 15 minutes of watching my dad came home from work & we showed him. he was pretty impressed. by this time they were on their way, but had been moving at a snail's pace. they finally faded into the distance easily since it was getting dark. unfortunately we had no cameras w\ film to capture it, which i sorely regret to this day. i forgot about it for a few years (perhaps repressed) but it resurfaced in a conversation with my sister recently & i was able to recall what i saw. i have been haunted by it ever since & have no doubt in my mind that we are being visited.
Object Flight Path: Stationary,Hovering then path,Path with directional change,Path then hovering
